verses.content: LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Juda lal ina chun fe thla la, chutaka chun hi thu hi zu hril rawh:
Aw nang Juda lal, David lal- ṭhungphaa ṭhung, nang le i siehlaw- hai le i mihai, hieng dai kawtkhâr- haia lûthai hin LALPA thu chu lo ngai ta u.

LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Felna le rorêlna chu tirsuok unla, nêksâwrtu kuta inthawk suksieta um chu sansuok ro; thil dik naw chu thaw naw unla, thawluina chu thaw naw unla, hmeithaihai le, mikhuolhai le pa neilohai chunga chun; hi hmuna hin mi thiem thisen chu insuo bawk naw ro.
Hieng thilhai hi in thaw ngei ngei chun, hi hi dai kawtkhârahai hin, David lalṭhungphaa ṭhung lalhai, sakawr tawlailîra le sakawr chung- haia chuong, ama le a siehlawhai le a mihai, lût um an tih.
Nisienlakhawm, hieng thuhai hi in ngai naw chun, LALPA chun a tih: keima ngei insâlin kân khâm a, hi in hi rausan ni ngei a tih.
Juda lal in chungthua chun LALPA chun hieng hin a ti sih a: Ka ta ding chun Gilead i na, Lebanon lu leh; nisienlakhawm, matheiloin thla- lêra le khawpui hluo loah ka siem ding che a nih.
I chunga chun suksetuhai, mi tin el chu mâni hriemhrei seng leh, ka buotsai ding a nih; anni chun i ditthlang sidar dâm chu sât thlâng an ta, meiah tîng an tih.
Hnam tamtakhai chun hi khaw- pui hi fekhêl an ta, mi tin chun mâni tuolbâwm kuoma chun, “Iengtiziea hi khawpui ropuitak hi LALPAIN hieng- a a thaw el am a na?” tîng an tih.
Chun, anni chun, “LALPA an Pathien thuthlung chu an nghatsan a, pathien danghai an biek a, an rawng an bâwl leiin a nih,” tiin dawn an tih.
Mithi ta dingin ṭap naw unla, ama chu sûn bawk naw ro; ami- ruokchu, mi a fe hmang ta ding chun nasatakin ṭap unla; ama chu a hung kîr ta naw ding lei le, a piengna ram chu a hmu ta naw ding leiin.
Juda lal Josia naupa Sallum a pa aia rorêla, hi hmun mâksantu chungthua chun LALPA chun hieng- hin a ti sih a:
“Hitaka hin ama chu hung kîr nâwk ta naw ni; amiruokchu, ama chu sala an ṭhuoina hmuna chun, chutaka chun thîng a ta, hi ram hi hmu nâwk ta naw ni,” tiin.
A in fel nawnaa bâwltu le, a pindanhai indik lonaa bâwltu chu a chung a rik; ama chun a tuolbâwm sinthawna chu man boin a hmang a, a hlaw khawm a pêk nawh a;
ama chun, “In lientak ka ta dingin bâwl ka ta, pindan chung- hnung lien tâwktak hai leh” a ta. Chuongchun, tukverhai a siem a, sidar thingin a sûng ân thuo a, rawng sen a nâl a.
Sidara în huon khum leiin lalah în ngai am a nih? I pa chun a fâkin a dâwn a, indikna le rorêlna chu a thaw a ni nâwm a nih? Chuongchun, ama ta ding chun a hung ṭhah a.
Mi tlasamhai le mi rimsihai chungthu chu a rêl a, chuongchun, a ṭhah a. Hi hi keima mi hre dingin a ni nâwm a nih? LALPA chun a tih.
Amiruokchu, nanga mithai le i lungril chu inhnarna le, mi thiem thisen insuona ding le, nêksâwrna ding le, thawluina ding le, chu chu thawnaa ding chau naw chu thil dang ding a ni nawh a.

Chuleiin, Juda lal Josia naupa Jehoiakim chungthua chun LALPAIN hieng hin a tih: Ama chu “Aw ka unaupa,” tiin amanih, “Aw farnu,” tiin amanih, sûn naw ni hai a; “Aw lalpa,” tiin amanih, “Aw a ropuina chu,” tiin amanih, sûn bawk naw ni hai.
Sabengtung phûm angin phûm an ta, Jerusalem dai kawtkhârhai khêla hnûka kei dawkin.
Lebanona chun hang fe la, hang khêk rawh: Basana inthawk chun i râwl insuo la, Abarima inthawk chun khêk rawh: i hmangaihai po po chu an bohmang vawng ta sih a.
I vângneinaa chun i kuomah thu ka hril a; amiruokchu, nang chun, “Ngai naw ning,” i tih a. I naupang laia inthawk tah hi hi i khawsak dân a ni hrim a; ka râwl hi i ngai ngai nawh.
I berâmpuhai po po chu thliin châwm a ta, i hmangaihai chu salah intâng an tih: chu pha chun mathei- loin, i khawhlonahai po po lei chun inzak i ta, buoi ngei ngei i tih.
Aw Lebanon hluotu, sidar thinghaia bu septu, nuhmei nauhase nat anga natna, i chunga tuornahai a hung tlung pha chun lungsiet i va um âwm de!
LALPA chun, ka hring zing angin, Jehoiakim naupa Konia chu ka kut changtienga kutsebi sûng- phûm ni sienla khawm, chutaka inthawk chun hmalthlâng ka ti che;
chun, nangma hringna zawng- tuhai kuta le, i ṭi Babulon lal Nebukadnezzar le Kaldaihai kuta chun pêng ka ti che.
Peisuok ka ti cheh a, i nu chun ram dangah paw lût a ti cheh a, i piengna ram ni loa chun, chutaka chun thîng i tih.
Nisienlakhawm, ram an lung- rilin kîr an nuomna tieng chun kîr nâwk naw ni hai.
Hi Konia hi bêl kawi hmusitum am a nih? Ama hi bêl amaa ditna um hlek lo am a nih? Iengdinga pei suoka, ama le a chihai, an ihriet naw rama chu pei suoka um am an na?
Aw leihnuoi, leihnuoi, leihnuoi, LALPA thu chu ngai ta.

LALPA chun hieng hin a tih: Hi pa hi nau boah, a dam sûnga mi hlawtling ngai lo dingin ziek rawh, ama chia mi hrim hrim hi tukhawm hlawtling ngai naw ni hai; David lalṭhungphaa ṭhung thua le, Juda rama ro la rêl pei ding thuah.
